Package Catalano.Imaging.Filters

The Catalano.Imaging.Filters namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image processing filters.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdaptiveContrastEnhancement
    Adaptive Contrast Enhancement is modification of the gray level values based on some criterion that adjusts its parameters as local image characteristics change.
    Add
    Add filter - add pixel values of one or two images.
    And
    Add filter - Performs logical operator "and" between two images.
    ArtifactsRemoval
    Remove artifacts caused by uneven lightning.
    Blob
    Blob object.
    BlobDetection
    Detects blobs.
    BlobsFiltering
    Eliminates blobs with certain area.
    Blur
    Blur filter.
    BottomHat
    Bottom-hat operator from Mathematical Morphology.
    BradleyLocalThreshold
    Adaptive thresholding using the integral image.
    Closing
    Closing operator from Mathematical Morphology.
    ColorFiltering
    Color filtering.
    Convolution
    Convolution filter.
    CosineTransform
    Cosine transform filter.
    Crop
    Crop an image.
    Difference
    Difference filter - get the difference between overlay and source images.
    DifferenceOfGaussian
    Difference of Gaussians is a feature enhancement algorithm that involves the subtraction of one blurred version of an original image from another.
    Dilatation
    Dilatation operator from Mathematical Morphology.
    Division
    Division filter - divide pixel values of one or two images.
    Emboss
    Emboss filter.
    Erosion
    Erosion operator from Mathematical Morphology.
    ExtractBlob
    Extract blobs with specified ID.
    ExtractBoundary
    Extract Boundary using approach with morphology operators.
    ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel
    Extract normalized RGB channel from color image.
    ExtractRGBChannel
    Extract RGB channel from image.
    ExtractYCbCrChannel
    Extract YCbCr channel from image.
    FillHoles
    Fill holes in objects in binary image.
    FloodFill
    Flood Fill filter.
    FourierTransform
    Fourier Transform.
    FrequencyFilter
    Filtering of frequencies outside of specified range in complex Fourier transformed image.
    GammaCorrection
    The filter performs gamma correction of specified image in RGB color space.
    GaussianBlur
    Gaussian blur filter.
    Grayscale
    Base class for image grayscaling.
    HighBoost
    High Boost Filter.
    HistogramEqualization
    Histogram equalization filter.
    HistogramShrink
    Decrease image contrast by compressing the gray values.
    HistogramStretch
    Stretch histogram across the entire gray level range, which has the effect of increasing the contrast of a low contrast image.
    HomomorphicFilter
    Is a frequency domain filtering process that compresses the brightness, while enhancing the contrast.
    HorizontalIntensityStatistics
    Horizontal intensity statistics.
    ImageQuantization
    Also called Gray level reduction.
    ImageStatistics
    Gather statistics about image in RGB color space.
    Intersect
    Intersect filter - get MIN of pixels in two images.
    Invert
    Invert image.
    Kuwahara
    Kuwahara filter is able to apply smoothing on the image while preserving the edges.
    LevelsLinear
    Linear correction of RGB channels.

    Median filter.
    Merge
    Merge filter - get MAX of pixels in two images.

    Minimum

Package Catalano.Imaging.Filters Description

The Catalano.Imaging.Filters namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image processing filters.
